description: Contributed to the development of a microservices-based project for the Sri Lankan Tea Board Value Chain Management System.

As an Associate Software Engineer, led development efforts on multiple cutting-edge fintech projects, including NDB Neos Internet Banking, First Capitol Investments online admin portal, First Capitol Investments EKYC portal, and Bank of Ceylon Internet Banking, leveraging expertise in software engineering principles to drive innovation and achieve measurable results.

Gained experience in FINTECH with online banking solutions for National Development Bank, Neos platform, and FirstCapitol eKYC platforms. Utilized technologies such as Spring MVC, Java, Spring Boot, Maven, Hibernate, Angular, JSP, and MySQL. I had the opportunity to work on complex Java backends and gain an understanding of project structures.
